opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
Appeal dismissed as moot.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

casebody.head_matter:
516 A.2d 1386
Allen J. BECKMAN v. Dan ABRAMOVITZ and Natan Abramovitz and Integrated Systems International, Inc., Appellants.

Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
